Index.in-Ukraine-2009: DM-Project has been a reliable partner of Ukrainian doctors since 2009
Index.integrated1: - Designing of medical institutions, with the production of turnkey project documentation
Index.integrated2: - High-tech medical equipment for equipping intensive care units, operating rooms, sterilization units, medical furniture and consumables
Index.service-text: Our service department carries out systematic work to maintain/keep medical equipment manufactured by Dräger, AT-OS, Renosem, PROSH, Lojer in working order. There is a maintenance plan developed by DM-PROJECT engineers for each type of equipment.
Index.projectings1: The phased design of the future clinic with maximum detail and taking into account the specifics of each department
Index.projectings2: Calculation of the required capacity and design of utilities and systems
Index.projectings3: Design of medical gases supply systems
Index.projectings4: Design and installation of architectural systems - consoles, panels

AboutPage.information1: DM-PROJECT was founded in 2009 as an authorized official representative of the German company Dräger in Ukraine, the world leader in the production of human life support systems.
AboutPage.information2: Today, the company's main activities include not only the sale of high-quality medical equipment, but also the development and implementation of integrated solutions for medical institutions, from design to service and staff training.
AboutPage.information3: The service department of DM-PROJECT performs maintenance of more than 4000 devices manufactured by Dräger, which are installed in public and private medical institutions in all regions of Ukraine.
AboutPage.information4: In response to market challenges, our technologies are constantly being improved; our managers and engineers regularly attend advanced training.
AboutPage.information5: We take care of our clients, advise them and offer unique solutions that meet any requirements and specifics of medical institutions.

ServicePage.title: Service
ServicePage.contact-form-medicalFacility: The Name of the Medical Facility
ServicePage.contact-paragraph1: According to the company's policy, technical support and service is an important part of our activity.
ServicePage.contact-paragraph2: The company DM-PROJECT carries out systematic work to maintain Dräger equipment in working condition. There are more than 4200 units of Dräger medical devices in Ukraine, and for each of them there is an individual service plan developed by the DM-PROJECT service department.
ServicePage.contact-paragraph3: This ensures the reliable functioning of medical equipment, protect clinics from abnormal emergency situations because of breakdowns. For medical institutions, this way is the most economical, as their own experience has shown.
ServicePage.contact-paragraph4: In Ukraine, the Dräger company entrusts the installation and maintenance of their equipment exclusively to service engineers of the DM-PROJECT, who have undergone special training in Germany. Due to strict adherence to these rules, Dräger equipment can work without failure for more than 20 years, and for it there is practically no such concept as the term of operation.
ServicePage.contact-paragraph5: Timely and high-quality training of personnel in the rules of working with the equipment allows you to effectively use its wide possibilities to save the lives of patients from the very first day of its operation. That is why the DM-PROJECT pays great attention to the process of training medical personnel to work with equipment, is always open to issues of support and development of educational programs for medical professionals of Ukraine with the aim of conveying to them information about the latest developments in the field of medicine and involves them in mastering new knowledge and skills.

ProjectPage.title: Projects (Переклад Гугл)
ProjectPage.project-form-medicalFacility: The Name of the Medical Facility
ProjectPage.project-head1: The design of medical facilities today is a fairly important separate branch of the medical business, which is developing quite quickly. Not every project company is able to complete the documentation of a modern medical facility at a decent level.
ProjectPage.project-head2: LLC "DM-PROJECT" offers its customers a full range of services for the production of turnkey project documentation for the creation or re-equipment of a medical facility. Preparation of project documentation consists of 5 stages:
ProjectPage.project-prehead1: 1. Task analysis and preparation of the "Medical task"
ProjectPage.project-paragraph1: Task analysis and preparation of the "Medical task" The medical assignment and the design assignment determine the form, structure, and purpose of the facility in accordance with construction, sanitary, and fire regulations.
ProjectPage.project-paragraph2: The design task and the Medical task are part of the mandatory initial data for the development of the project of construction or reconstruction of the health care facility and must contain the entire set of the main requirements of the Customer in accordance with the purpose, profile and capacity of the facility.
ProjectPage.project-paragraph3: Our company, based on the wishes and preliminary assessments of the future user of the object, conducts an independent assessment of the possibility of construction on the selected site of a medical institution of one or another capacity or functional orientation.
ProjectPage.project-paragraph4: After preliminary agreement with the user and the Customer of the project, prepares the Design Task and the Medical Task on behalf of the Customer. These documents become the basis for the development of project documentation.
ProjectPage.project-paragraph5: The medical program specifies the list of necessary premises of the future medical institution, their area, determines the required number of medical personnel.
ProjectPage.project-paragraph6: The program is compiled on the basis of regulatory documents on the construction and organization of the work of a medical institution, taking into account the specifics of the object, which is reflected in the Medical Task, as well as in accordance with the most modern medical technologies.
ProjectPage.project-paragraph7: At the "P" stage, urban planning, architectural, ecological, technical, technological, engineering solutions of the object, the estimated cost of construction and technical and economic indicators are determined. The "Technological solutions" section, as a fundamental section of the medical facility project, includes:
ProjectPage.project-paragraph8: a) development of layout schemes for medical equipment and functional furniture in premises;
ProjectPage.project-paragraph9: b) preparation and development of technical tasks for the installation of engineering communications to ensure appropriate conditions for the stay of patients and staff, the functioning of medical equipment according to the sections:
ProjectPage.project-paragraph17: At the "P" stage, the processes of construction and assembly work are specified and detailed. At this stage, detailed specifications, drawings, specifications and estimates are developed.
ProjectPage.project-paragraph18: The "Technological solutions" section, as a fundamental section of the medical facility project, includes:
ProjectPage.project-paragraph19: data on dimensions and mass of large equipment units;
ProjectPage.project-paragraph20: the task of installing collateral parts in ogo5 production structures to ensure the installation of equipment and the laying of technological communications;
ProjectPage.project-paragraph21: assignment of equipment connection points to engineering communications (water supply, sewerage, electricity supply, supply, medical gases, local ventilation suction devices) indicating the characteristics of the connection nodes, their exact location, etc.;
ProjectPage.project-paragraph22: data on types, quantitative and qualitative characteristics of engineering resources consumed by a unit of technological installed equipment;
ProjectPage.project-paragraph23: volumes and characteristics of effluents, emissions and other emissions from operating equipment.
ProjectPage.project-paragraph24: Specialists of "DM-PROEKT" LLC carry out author's supervision during the construction, reconstruction and major repair and re-equipment of medical facilities.

Shares.shares-awd655-h2-v1-specific4: Витратомір нейтралізуючого засобу для H версії

Shares.shares-awd655-h2-v1-specific9: Вставка для форм для відбитків зубів на 10 позицій, A068
Shares.shares-awd655-h2-v1-specific10: Вставка для лотків/касет на 7 позицій, 40 мм A070
Shares.shares-awd655-h2-v1-specific11: Ковпачок адаптера для наконечників A067 – 8 шт.
Shares.shares-awd655-h2-v1-text1: Обладнання AT-OS – це розумний вибір для дезінфекції стоматологічних інструментів. Мийно-дезінфекційні машини гарантують ідеальні результати завдяки використанню найвищих технологій і здатні задовольнити всі вимоги стоматологічної галузі, завдяки широкому асортименту аксесуарів в комплекті.
Shares.shares-awd655-h2-v1-text2: Щоб гарантувати завжди ідеальне миття та найкращу якість AT-OS пропонує лінійку найсучасніших мийно-дезінфекційних машин з попередньо встановленими налаштованими програмами для кожного типу стоматологічних інструментів і можливістю спеціального налаштування програми для задоволення будь-яких потреб. Програми миття та дезінфекції є результатом багаторічних досліджень і досвіду в стоматології та ортодонтії, для того щоб отримати ідеальні та відтворювані результати. Кожна функція налаштовується за допомогою зручного кольорового графічного дисплея, щоб полегшити використання машини користувачем.
Shares.shares-awd655-h2-v1-text3: Завдяки електронним системам останнього покоління, кожен параметр циклу  постійно перевіряється та контролюється. Мийно-дезінфекційні машини виробництва AT-OS є високонадійним обладнанням, що принесе користь і лікарняним закладам і, в першу чергу,  пацієнтам.

Мийно-дезінфекційні машини гарантують ідеальні результати завдяки використанню найвищих технологій і здатні задовольнити всі вимоги стоматологічної галузі, завдяки широкому асортименту аксесуарів в комплекті.
Shares.shares-awd655-h2-v2-text2: Щоб гарантувати завжди ідеальне миття та найкращу якість AT-OS пропонує лінійку найсучасніших мийно-дезінфекційних машин з попередньо встановленими налаштованими програмами для кожного типу стоматологічних інструментів і можливістю спеціального налаштування програми для задоволення будь-яких потреб. Програми миття та дезінфекції є результатом багаторічних досліджень і досвіду в стоматології та ортодонтії, для того щоб отримати ідеальні та відтворювані результати. Кожна функція налаштовується за допомогою зручного кольорового графічного дисплея, щоб полегшити використання машини користувачем.
Shares.shares-awd655-h2-v2-text3: Завдяки електронним системам останнього покоління, кожен параметр циклу  постійно перевіряється та контролюється. Мийно-дезінфекційні машини виробництва AT-OS є високонадійним обладнанням, що принесе користь і лікарняним закладам і, в першу чергу,  пацієнтам.
Shares.shares-linea-title: Offer for dental clinics, small operating rooms and procedure rooms
Shares.shares-linea-specific1: panel with wall mounting L=1200mm, placement of connectors in 2 rows;
Shares.shares-linea-specific6: electric socket with LED indicator - 5 pcs.;
Shares.shares-linea-specific9: additional built-in medical rail in the lower part - 1pc;
Shares.shares-linea-specific10: infusion pole with two-point fixation to the medical rail - 1 pc.
Shares.shares-linea-text1: The Linea product line is designed for use in almost all areas. In the wards, intensive care units, anesthesia rooms, operation rooms, rehabilitation – thanks to its modular design, the Linea family is a customized media delivery solution for many hospital applications.
Shares.shares-linea-text2: Linea products are made of durable extruded aluminum profiles with rounded edges and perfectly integrated joints for maximum safety, ease of cleaning and hygiene. As part of a unified training concept, there is a standardized list of over 20 disinfectants available for the Linea family, as well as for other Dräger devices and accessories. The absence of moving parts also minimizes the required maintenance work.
Shares.shares-polaris200-title: Offer for dental clinics, small operating rooms and procedure rooms
Shares.shares-polaris200-specific1: the light head Polaris 200 lamp on a spring-loaded lever – 1pc;
Shares.shares-polaris200-text1: Polaris®200 surgical lighting systems provide cool light with natural colors and rich contrast for thousands of hours of worry-free work without straining your hospital budget.
Shares.shares-polaris200-text2: The maximum light intensity is 160,000 lux. Light intensity can be easily reduced to 40,000 lux. Each LED is equipped with its own lens reflector system. The homogeneous light column provides the surgeon with a controlled shadow, saturated with contours, and a natural color rendering of the operating field.
Shares.shares-polaris200-text3: The classic round design includes integrated handles for non-sterile personnel and a control panel for easy use and operation. Sterile personnel can easily position the Polaris 200 using the central sterilizable handle. You can choose a sterilized or sterile handle, depending on your concept of infection prevention. Each of the four clearly marked control buttons performs a single function. The smooth, seamless body makes cleanup quick and easy, and its lightweight design allows for easy placing.
Shares.shares-polaris200-text4: The Polaris 200 surgical lighting system is a cost-effective, highly efficient solution for daily surgical work. This light is designed for years of trouble-free operation and minimal maintenance. Its exceptional reliability and value for money will help you reduce investment costs today, as well as maintenance and operating costs tomorrow.
Shares.shares-polaris200-2-title: Offer for dental clinics, small operating rooms and procedure rooms
Shares.shares-polaris200-2-specific1: the light head Polaris 200 lamp on a spring-loaded lever – 2pc;
Shares.shares-polaris200-2-text1: Polaris®200 surgical lighting systems provide cool light with natural colors and rich contrast for thousands of hours of worry-free work without straining your hospital budget.
Shares.shares-polaris200-2-text2: The maximum light intensity is 160,000 lux. Light intensity can be easily reduced to 40,000 lux. Each LED is equipped with its own lens reflector system. The homogeneous light column of both lamps provides the surgeon with a controlled shadow, saturated with contours, and a natural color rendering of the operating field.
Shares.shares-polaris200-2-text3: The classic round design includes integrated handles for non-sterile personnel and a control panel for easy use and operation. Sterile personnel can easily position the Polaris 200 using the central sterilizable handle. You can choose a sterilized or sterile handle, depending on your concept of infection prevention. Each of the four clearly marked control buttons performs a single function. The smooth, seamless body makes cleanup quick and easy, and its lightweight design allows for easy placing.
Shares.shares-polaris200-2-text4: The Polaris 200 surgical lighting system is a cost-effective, highly efficient solution for daily surgical work. This light is designed for years of trouble-free operation and minimal maintenance. Its exceptional reliability and value for money will help you reduce investment costs today, as well as maintenance and operating costs tomorrow.
Shares.shares-fabius-title: We offer a ready-made solution for your operating room
Shares.shares-fabius-pehead: Anesthesia workstation Fabius plus XL and Patient monitor Vista 120S
Shares.shares-fabius-specific12: O2 CS hose, 3 m, NIST, DIN
Shares.shares-fabius-specific13: N2O CS hose, 3 m, NIST, EN DIN
Shares.shares-fabius-specific14: AIR CS hose, 3 m, NIST, DIN
Shares.shares-atlan300-title: We offer a complete solution for your operating room
Shares.shares-atlan300-pehead: Anesthesia workstation Atlan A300 and Patient monitor Vista 120S
Shares.shares-atlan300-specific14: O2 CS hose, 3 m, NIST, DIN
Shares.shares-atlan300-specific15: N2O CS hose, 3 m, NIST, EN DIN
Shares.shares-atlan300-specific16: AIR CS hose, 3 m, NIST, DIN
Shares.shares-atlan300-text1: The combination of Atlan A300 anaesthesia machine and Vista 120S multi-parameter monitor provides true integrated workstation functionality.
Shares.shares-atlan300-text2: Atlan A300 is designed for low-flow and minimal-flow inhalation anaesthesia in adults, pediatric patients and neonates.
Shares.shares-atlan300-text3: The design architecture of Atlan A300 provides an ergonomic and comfortable workstation for any size operating room.
Shares.shares-atlan300-text4: Atlan A300 is equipped with an electronically driven E-Vent plus piston ventilator (no drive-gas required), mechanically controlled gas mixer with electronic flow measurement, integrated gas measurement module, integrated warmed compact breathing system to warm breathing gas and reduce condensation, fully automatic system test, integrated manual emergency O2 supply, integrated anesthetic gas scavanging, rechargeable battery (up to 120 minutes of operation), 15.3-inch touchscreen display.
Shares.shares-atlan300-text5: In the event of a central gas supply outage and no spare gas cylinders are available, patient ventilation can be continued with atmospheric air.
Shares.shares-atlan300-text6: Atlan A300 anaesthesia machine is equipped with several options to expand ventilation and monitoring capabilities and optimise workflows:
Shares.shares-atlan300-text8: In addition to the standard ventilation modes: Manual/Spontaneous (MAN/SPON), Pressure Controlled (PC-CMV), Volume Controlled (VC-CMV), this option provides Synchronised Volume Controlled (VC-SIMV) and Synchronised Pressure Controlled (PC-SIMV) ventilation.
Shares.shares-atlan300-text10: Indicator and trend for efficiency of fresh-gas setting and anaesthetic agent consumption (Econometer and Low Flow Wizard (with no trend)) to support intuitive and convenient application of minimal- and low-flow anaesthesia. Access to gas and oxygen consumption and anaesthetic agent uptake data to analyse the low- and minimal-flow practices.
Shares.shares-atlan300-text12: Expert Views allows you to display 3 waveforms and 1 row of parameter fields or 4 waveforms at a time.
Shares.shares-atlan300-text13: Vista 120S patient monitor provides physiological monitoring for patients of all ages: 3-lead ECG, SpO2, temperature, respiration, and non-invasive blood pressure.
Shares.shares-atlan300-text14: Vista 120S has a 12’ colour TFT touchscreen, 8 channels (displaying up to 11 waveforms), stores up to 120 hours of key parameter trends, up to 1200 NIBP measurements and 200 alarm events, and lasts 350 minutes on battery power.
Shares.shares-atlan300-text15: Atlan A300/Vista 120S anaesthesia station will help make the anaesthesia process as efficient, high-quality and safe as possible for both patients and medical staff.
Shares.shares-vista120-specific8: SPO2 Nellcor sensor OXIBANDSENSOR adults, children
Shares.shares-fabius-text1: We offer a complete solution for your operating room - the Fabius plus XL / Vista 120S Аnesthesia Station.
Shares.shares-fabius-text2: The combination of the Fabius plus XL anesthesia machine and the Vista 120S multiparameter monitor provides true integrated workstation functionality.
Shares.shares-fabius-text3: The Fabius plus XL anesthesia machine is suitable for low-flow anesthesia in adults and pediatric patients.
Shares.shares-fabius-text4: The Fabius plus XL provides effective ventilation at the level required for intensive care in the following modes: Manual/Spontaneous (MAN/SPON), Pressure Controlled (PC-CMV), Volume Controlled (VC-CMV), and has an integrated electronically controlled and electrically driven piston ventilator (no driving gas required), Breathing system with integrated heater to heat breathing gas and reduce condensation, mechanical gas mixer for 3 gases, battery backup for up to 120 minutes (minimum 45 minutes runtime), 10.5’ high contrast monitor, large storage drawers.
Shares.shares-fabius-text5: The Scio Four Oxi gas analysis module measures inspiratory and expiratory O2, CO2, N2O and anaesthetics.
Shares.shares-fabius-text6: The values are displayed on the Vista 120S patient monitor.
Shares.shares-fabius-text7: The Vista 120S patient monitor provides physiological monitoring for patients of all ages: 3-lead ECG, SpO2, temperature, respiration, and non-invasive blood pressure.
Shares.shares-fabius-text8: The Vista 120S has a 12’ colour TFT touchscreen, 8 channels (displaying up to 11 waveforms), a gas monitoring interface, stores up to 120 hours of key parameter trends, up to 1200 NIBP measurements and 200 alarm events, and lasts 350 minutes on battery power.
Shares.shares-fabius-text9: The Fabius plus XL / Vista 120S Anaesthesia Station will help you maximise your therapeutic potential and improve patient safety.
